author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Gameplay Reveal Trailer for March of Giants, a free-to-play 4v4 war MOBA developed by Amazon Games Montreal. Players will embody larger-than-life Giants to command thousands of soldiers in battle, making use of strategic tactics and multiple abilities. March of Giants is coming to PC (Steam) with a Closed Alpha running from September 2 through September 14.
title: March of Giants - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Face off against the fearsome Bell Beast in this new Hollow Knight: Silksong gameplay, captured in crisp 4K 60FPS. This direct-feed footage showcases the intensity of the boss encounter, highlighting fast-paced combat, fluid movement, and the unique abilities the Bell Beast brings to the fight.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - Bell Beast Boss Gameplay (4K 60FPS)

author: IGN
description: Watch the Early Access Kickstarter Trailer for The Dino Run 2, a prehistoric multiplayer early access platformer developed by Pixeljam. Players will choose and create their very own dinosaur to platform and escape extinction for good. Explore a world of hazards, secrets, and shortcuts in The Dino Run 2, coming soon to PC (Steam) with a Kickstarter available now.
title: The Dino Run 2 - Official Early Access Kickstarter Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Year 9 Season 3 Downfall Gameplay Trailer for For Honor, a third-person melee-based action game developed by Ubisoft. Players can get a look at the visceral combat that can be engaged with in Year 9 Season 3 Downfall. Access the Lady Saori Hero Skin for Nobushi alongside the new Year 9 Season 3 Downfall for For Honor, launching on September 11 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, and PC.

#ign #gaming
title: For Honor - Official Year 9 Season 3 Downfall Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Rebuild Expansion Trailer for RoadCraft, a building and driving physics-based simulation game developed by Saber Interactive. Players will focus on rebuilding structures after disasters strike in the Rebuild Expansion. Manage train derailments, floods, and more with two new maps to deal with alongside new difficulty options, fuel management, and more. The Rebuild Expansion for RoadCraft is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#ign #gaming
title: RoadCraft - Official Rebuild Expansion Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Part 2: Out in the Wild Trailer for Dying Light: The Beast, a first-person parkour-based zombie shooter developed by Techland. Players will experience the second part of an ongoing narrative as the player is out in the wild and finally free. However, in the pursuit of revenge, a trade from one hell to another might be on the table after all. Dying Light: The Beast is launching on September 19 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#ign #gaming
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official Part 2: Out in the Wild Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The wait is finally over. You can stop spamming chat. Hollow Knight: Silksong is finally here and playable right now. Here's the first 14 minutes of Hollow Knight: Silksong Gameplay, Team Cherry's long awaited sequel to their hit 2017 game. 

#IGN #Gaming #HollowKnightSilksong
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Gameplay - The First 14 Minutes

author: IGN
description:
007 First Light is the Hitman and Uncharted hybrid we've been hoping for, but what does that mean? In our video preview for this upcoming James Bond video game, we dive into the biggest story and gameplay details on 007's next adventure, First Light.

From gadgets such as Bond's Omega wristwatch, which doubles as a laser, to Aston Martin car chase sequences, and more, gaining the Licence to Kill has never looked better. Alongside hidden details you might've missed, we also sat down with Hakan Abrak, IOI’s CEO and First Light’s game director, as well as cinematic and narrative director Martin Emborg. 

#IGN #007FirstLight #Preview
title: 007: First Light - The Big Preview

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest The Sims 4 trailer to see what's coming with the Adventure Awaits expansion pack, which brings new experiences, the ability to create custom venues for Sims to explore, and more. The Sims 4: Adventure Awaits expansion pack will be available on EA App PC/Mac, Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4 (PS4), and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on October 2, 2025 (at 10 AM PT).

In The Sims 4: Adventure Awaits expansion pack, new experiences are out there for you to discover – or create! Make Getaways that last a day or more like a kids’ camp, fitness retreat, or even a romantic contest. Plus, create Custom Venues for Sims to explore and share them to the Gallery for other Simmers to enjoy.

Nurture the spirit of play in childhood and carry it through a bold, adventurous life. Kids will find their playtime more meaningful than ever with Childhood Sentiments, Imaginary Friends, and more ways to play like new games, Skills, and Modular Playgrounds you can customize.

#ign #gamin
title: The Sims 4: Adventure Awaits - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Parkour and Combat Overview Trailer for Dying Light: The Beast, the new installment in the first-person parkour shooter developed by Techland. Players can get the rundown on the updates and refinements to the game's core Parkour and Combat systems, including improved parkour physics, unlimited climbing, improved hit reactions, more impactful weapon swings, and more. Dying Light: The Beast is launching on September 19 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#ign #gaming
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official Parkour and Combat Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 trailer to see what to expect with the anniversary update, which brings two new game modes, new maps for the Operations and Eternal War modes, weapons, enemies and more. The start of Year 2 also brings the release of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marines 2's Season Pass II, featuring new Chapter-inspired cosmetics. 

The new Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 trailer showcases the new Operation: Vortex, the new PvP Arena: Bridge, new game modes, and new weapons like the pyreblaster, pyrecannon, and power axe. We also get to see the new Majoris enemy: Chaos Spawn, along with the contents of the Season Pass 2: the Black Templars Champion Pack and the Imperial Fists cosmetic pack. 

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 anniversary update and season pass 2 are available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#IGN #SpaceMarine2 #Warhammer40K
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Official Anniversary Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Odachi Gameplay Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, the upcoming action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. 

Players can get a feel for the lethality of the Odachi weapon, a broadsword-esque blade that is slow to attack, but deadly to be inflicted upon with high damage. Ghost of Yotei is launching on October 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GhostOfYotei #ActionGames
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Odachi Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Hell is different than you think. Watch the new Black Phone 2 trailer for the upcoming horror film sequel starring Ethan Hawke, Mason Thames, and Madeleine McGraw. Black Phone 2 opens in theaters on October 17, 2025.

Four years ago, 13-year-old Finn killed his abductor and escaped, becoming the sole survivor of The Grabber. But true evil transcends death … and the phone is ringing again. 

Four-time Academy Award nominee Ethan Hawke returns to the most sinister role of his career as The Grabber seeks vengeance on Finn (Mason Thames) from beyond the grave by menacing Finn’s younger sister, Gwen (Madeleine McGraw). 

As Finn, now 17, struggles with life after his captivity, the headstrong 15-year-old Gwen begins receiving calls in her dreams from the black phone and seeing disturbing visions of three boys being stalked at a winter camp known as Alpine Lake. 

Determined to solve the mystery and end the torment for both her and her brother, Gwen persuades Finn to visit the camp during a
title: Black Phone 2 - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Ethan Hawke, Mason Thames, Madeleine McGraw

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Angela Character Reveal Trailer for Marvel Rivals, a free-to-play team-based action shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players can get familiar with Angela, The Hand of Heaven, equipped with the power of flight, a sturdy shield, a spear, and dual axes that allow for quick and effective strikes against the enemy. Angela is launching with Season 4 on September 12 for Marvel Rivals on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#MarvelRivals #Gaming #IGN
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Angela Character Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the First Look Reveal Trailer for Football Manager 26, a football (soccer) management simulation game developed by Sports Interactive. 

Players will make key decisions across the Premier League on a journey to define their footballing destiny. Establish new foundations and tell a story of the most beautiful sport in the world with Football Manager 26, coming soon to macOS and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #FootballManager26 #SportsManagementSim
title: Football Manager 26 - Official First Look Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Marking the 80th anniversary of the end of World War II, and building off the success of their debut documentary Frog Fathers: Lessons from the Normandy Surf, World of Warships and FORCE BLUE are partnering up again for Frog Fathers 2: Last Battle of the Pacific. Coming November 5, this powerful documentary narrated by John C. McGinley follows FORCE BLUE's Rudy Reyes and a team of veteran Navy SEALs, Marines, and Green Beret as they journey to Okinawa. There, they retrace the footsteps of their forebears who fought in one of the bloodiest battles of the Pacific Theatre. Alongside honoring history, they’ll take on a mission of restoration, repairing a coral reef still bearing the scars of naval invasion.

World of Warships is also celebrating its 10th anniversary this month, marking ten years of support for charities, museums, and naval restoration projects.

#IGN #FrogFathers2 #Documentary
title: Frog Fathers 2: Last Battle of the Pacific - Official Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Console Launch Trailer for Void Crew, a space simulation co-op action-adventure game developed by Hutlihut Games. 

Players will assemble a crew to explore the cosmos to engage in battles from galaxy to galaxy. Scavenge loot, repair the ship, and journey into deep space in Void Crew, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S alongside PC (Steam).

#IGN #VoidCrew #ConsoleGaming
title: Void Crew - Official Console Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Hell is Us, a third-person exploration-focused action-adventure game developed by Rogue Factor. 

Players will explore a secluded country, beaten down by war, that was once their home. Dispatch paranormal enemies, investigate clues to find secrets, and face the past against the backdrop of a civil war in Hell is Us, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

 #IGN #HellIsUs #ActionAdventure
title: Hell is Us - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The new gameplay for IO Interactive's  007: First Light is finally here, and it's giving us some serious  Hitman vibes. In this Unlocked clip, we discuss the new details from the Sony State of Play, and what this means for the future of the James Bond gaming franchise. If you're a fan of Agent 47 or just a classic 007 fan, you won't want to miss this! #xbox #gaming #007firstlight 

This episode of Unlocked is sponsored by 5-hour ENERGY.
title: 007: First Light Looks a Lot Like Hitman, and We're Cool With That - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
When a single, unattributed missile is launched at the United States, a race begins to determine who is responsible and how to respond.
A House of Dynamite will be coming to select theaters October 3rd in the UK, select theaters globally on October 10th, and on Netflix on October 24th.
title: A House of Dynamite - Official Teaser (2025) Rebecca Ferguson, Greta Lee, Idris Elba

author: IGN
description: Check out the Rayman 30th Anniversary Event Launch Trailer for Brawlhalla, the hit 2D platform fighter developed by Blue Mammoth Games. Players can access a suite of content to celebrate 30 years of Rayman with a Super Metal Rayman skin, the Enchanted Forest Arena, and more to enjoy. The Rayman 30th Anniversary Event is available now in Brawlhalla for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android, and PC.
title: Brawlhalla x Rayman 30th Anniversary - Official Event Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: From Warner Bros. Pictures and Academy Award and BAFTA-winning filmmaker Emerald Fennell comes “WUTHERING HEIGHTS,” starring Academy Award and BAFTA nominee Margot Robbie opposite BAFTA nominee Jacob Elordi. The film also stars alongside Oscar nominee Hong Chau, Shazad Latif, Alison Oliver, BAFTA winner Martin Clunes, and Ewan Mitchell. Fennell directs from her own screenplay. The producers are Oscar nominee and BAFTA award winner Josey McNamara, Fennell, and Robbie. Sara Desmond and Oscar nominee Tom Ackerley are executive producing.
title: Wuthering Heights - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Margot Robbie, Jacob Elordi
